Name: Monthly Pass A
Description: 1. Purchase the Monthly Pass A to claim 100 Black Cards at 07:00 UTC every day for 30 days.\n2. You may purchase up to 2 Monthly Pass A only. Cannot own Monthly Pass A & Monthly Pass C in a same period.\n3. Once you have purchased a Monthly Pass A, you will receive 300 Black Cards immediately.

Name: Monthly Pass C
Description: 1. Purchase the Monthly Pass C to claim 90 Black Cards at 07:00 UTC every day for 30 days.\n2. You may purchase up to 2 Monthly Pass C only. Cannot own Monthly Pass A and Monthly Pass C in a same period.\n3. Once you have purchased a Monthly Pass C, you will receive 300 Black Cards immediately.
